meanings.sent1: She kept her white dress unsoiled during the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The freshly washed car looked unsoiled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: Even after playing in the mud, his shoes remained unsoiled.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation in the community was unsoiled by any scandal.
meanings.sent5: The snow on the mountain peak appeared unsoiled and untouched.

meanings.sent1: The chef presented the unsoiled plates to the customers.
meanings.sent2: The laundry detergent promised to keep clothes unsoiled.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue on the unsoiled carpet.
meanings.sent4: The artist's unsoiled canvas awaited the first brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The unsoiled kitchen counter gleamed under the bright lights.
